slides.title: Welcome to CPA FAR
slides.content:
# Financial Accounting & Reporting (FAR)

FAR covers **US GAAP** and **government accounting**.

## What You Will Learn

- **Concepts** - Framework
- **Standards** - Key ASCs
- **Government** - GASB
- **NFP** - Not-for-profit

## Exam Areas

| Area | Weight |
|------|--------|
| Conceptual framework | 25-35% |
| Financial statements | 30-40% |
| Transactions | 20-30% |
| State/local/NFP | 10-20% |

slides.title: Conceptual Framework
slides.content:
# FASB Framework

## Objectives

- Useful information
- Decision-making
- Economic resources

## Qualitative Characteristics

| Primary | Enhancing |
|---------|----------|
| Relevance | Comparability |
| Faithful representation | Verifiability |
| | Timeliness |
| | Understandability |

## Elements

- Assets, liabilities, equity
- Revenues, expenses, gains, losses

slides.title: Financial Statements
slides.content:
# Primary Statements

## Complete Set

| Statement | Purpose |
|-----------|--------|
| Balance sheet | Position |
| Income statement | Performance |
| Comprehensive income | All changes |
| Equity statement | Capital changes |
| Cash flows | Cash |
| Notes | Details |

## Balance Sheet Format

```
Assets = Liabilities + Equity

Current and non-current
```

slides.title: Revenue Recognition
slides.content:
# ASC 606

## Five Steps

```
1. Identify contract
2. Identify performance obligations
3. Determine transaction price
4. Allocate to obligations
5. Recognize when satisfied
```

## Satisfaction

| Type | When |
|------|------|
| Point in time | Control transfers |
| Over time | Continuous |

## Variable Consideration

- Constraint
- Expected value or most likely

slides.title: Leases
slides.content:
# ASC 842

## Classification

| Type | Criteria |
|------|----------|
| Finance | Transfer, purchase, life, value, specialized |
| Operating | Otherwise |

## Recognition

```
Right-of-use asset
Lease liability
At PV of payments
```

## Short-Term Exception

- < 12 months
- No purchase option
- Straight-line expense

slides.title: Intangibles and Goodwill
slides.content:
# ASC 350

## Intangible Assets

| Life | Treatment |
|------|----------|
| Finite | Amortize |
| Indefinite | Impairment test |

## Goodwill

```
Consideration
- Fair value of net assets
= Goodwill

Annual impairment test
```

## Impairment

- Qualitative assessment option
- Quantitative: Compare FV to CV

slides.title: Financial Instruments
slides.content:
# ASC 320 and 321

## Debt Securities

| Category | Measurement |
|----------|-------------|
| Trading | FV through NI |
| Available for sale | FV through OCI |
| Held to maturity | Amortized cost |

## Equity Securities

```
Generally FV through NI

Except: Equity method (20-50%)
```

## Derivatives

- FV through NI unless hedge

slides.title: Income Taxes
slides.content:
# ASC 740

## Deferred Taxes

| Difference | Effect |
|------------|--------|
| Temporary | DTA or DTL |
| Permanent | No deferred |

## Recognition

```
DTA: Deductible differences
DTL: Taxable differences

Valuation allowance if needed
```

## Presentation

- All non-current
- Net by tax jurisdiction

slides.title: Consolidation
slides.content:
# ASC 810

## Consolidation Model

| Model | Basis |
|-------|-------|
| Voting interest | > 50% |
| Variable interest | Primary beneficiary |

## Procedures

```
1. Eliminate intercompany
2. Adjust for PURP
3. Recognize NCI
4. Combine balances
```

## Equity Method

- Significant influence (20-50%)
- One-line consolidation

slides.title: Government Accounting
slides.content:
# GASB Standards

## Fund Types

| Category | Types |
|----------|-------|
| Governmental | General, special revenue, capital, debt, permanent |
| Proprietary | Enterprise, internal service |
| Fiduciary | Trust, custodial |

## Measurement Focus

| Fund | Focus |
|------|-------|
| Governmental | Current financial resources |
| Proprietary | Economic resources |

## Modified Accrual

- Revenue: Measurable and available
- Expenses: When liability incurred

slides.title: Not-for-Profit
slides.content:
# NFP Accounting

## Net Asset Classes

| Class | Restrictions |
|-------|-------------|
| Without restrictions | None |
| With restrictions | Donor-imposed |

## Financial Statements

| Statement | Purpose |
|-----------|--------|
| Financial position | Assets and liabilities |
| Activities | Changes in net assets |
| Cash flows | Cash movements |
| Functional expenses | By program/support |

## Contributions

- Revenue when received
- Conditional vs unconditional

slides.title: Statement of Cash Flows
slides.content:
# ASC 230

## Categories

| Activity | Examples |
|----------|----------|
| Operating | Trading |
| Investing | Assets, investments |
| Financing | Debt, equity |

## Methods

| Method | Starting Point |
|--------|---------------|
| Direct | Cash receipts/payments |
| Indirect | Net income |

## Non-Cash

- Disclosed separately
- Supplemental schedule
